(40) 332.August 22, 1940.TO BE KEPT UNDER LOCK AND KEY.It is requested that special care may be taken toensure the secrecy of this document.WAR CABINET.POST-WAR POLICY.Memorandum by the Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs.WITH reference to W.P. (40) 322 I circulate to my colleagues for their consideration a redraft of the proposed terms of reference of the ministerial committee suggested by the Minister of Information.H.Foreign Office, August 22, 1940.Proposed Terms of Reference./ 1. To make suggestions in regard to a post-war European and world systemw^th particular regard to the economic needs of the various nations, and to theproblem of adjusting the free life of small countries in a durable internationalorder.I 2. To consider means of perpetuating the national unity achieved in thisj country during the war through a social and economic structure designed to\ secure equality of opportunity and service among all classes of the community.11150 [21668]
